item.title: Tweet
item.description: If I could have three wishes for my best friends, they’d be: ❤ A long, happy and healthy life 🌼🐝 A planet for all species 🤖🍞🎪 Fully automated luxury communism for all. You ain’t never had a #friendLikeMe ❤️ 0 | 🔃 0
